00094 Matrix Attitude::Propagate(const vector<ssfTime> &_propTime)
00095 {
00096     cout << "Begin propagating... " << endl;
00097     m_pPropagator->Propagate(_propTime);
00098     // Store the propagated states
00099     return Matrix(3,3);
00100 }
